title: Coronation Street fans want Daniel axed after cheating on dying wife Sinead

Coronation Street fans want Daniel Osbourne axed from the soap after cheating on dying wife Sinead Tinker.

In scenes that had viewers at home gasping at their TV sets, Daniel snogged Bethany Platt down a ginnel.

After being kicked out of the flat for trying to ruin Sinead's final ever Christmas, Bethany found emotional Daniel crying on the street.

She tried to comfort heartbroken Daniel, who she has a crush on, telling him: "You made me feel like I wasn't that girl that got abused by this man. You made me feel like I was worth something."

Daniel broke down in Bethany's arms and the pair embraced, leading Daniel to snog Bethany, who kissed him back.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Eventually Bethany realised the error of her ways and said "no", pulling away from Daniel as they gazed into each other's eyes.

However, the pair were spotted by Ken Barlow, who scolded his son for cheating on his terminally ill wife.

Ken refused to listen to his son's excuses and angrily ordered Daniel to go home, while Bethany ran off in tears.

Will Sinead discover her husband cheated on her?

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Corrie viewers flocked to Twitter after watching Daniel and Bethany snog.

One viewer said: "Bethany & Daniel seriously? When poor Sinead is literally fighting just to get through the day right around the corner?"

"I hope Ken berates Daniel for kissing Bethany... despicable when your wife is dying," added another.

A third said: "Oh Daniel why? Poor Sinead"

"I absolutely hate that corrie felt the need to have this Daniel and Bethany thing when Sinead is dying. It’s so wrong. Can we just have a storyline without betrayal???," said a fourth.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

This came after Sinead threw Daniel out of the flat during their Christmas dinner .

Sinead was fed up with her husband's controlling behaviour and claimed he was trying to ruin her final ever Christmas.

She was determined to enjoy herself, despite being in constant agony, but Daniel wanted her to go back to bed.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Tensions reached boiling point during a very heated exchange over the plump Christmas tukey.

Sinead told Daniel to "stop bullying" her in dramatic scenes, while the rest of the family awkwardly watched on in stunned silence.

Daniel then left the flat after Sinead told him to leave and never return.

*Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesday and Fridays on ITV at 7.30pm and 8.30pm
description: Coronation Street viewers were disgusted when Daniel Osbourne snogged Bethany Platt in the ginnel - and he was caught by Ken Barlow
